attributes.long-description:
Ultimate Board Game Collection contains 24 classic board and table top games that have been played by countless families around the world. Games included are: Chess, Quatro, Checkers, Enigma, Backgammon, Reversi, Snakes & Ladders, Naval Battle, Parcheesi, Dice, Dominoes, Go, Chinese Checkers, Word Cubes, Mahjong Solitaire, Anagrams, Concentration, 3D Tic-Tac-Toe, Mancala, Jigsaws, Shogi, Quattro, Gomoku, Sudoku and Kakuro. Each game has a trophy that can be unlocked by completing a specific goal. Can you unlock all 24 trophies?

Ultimate Board Game Collection represents a great value and ultimate replayability and can be enjoyed by players of all ages.

Key Game Features
• Play against the CPU or up to 6 other players wirelessly, depending on the game
• User selectable sound track, choose from 4 different styles
• CPU opponent has multiple difficulty levels
• Includes 100 different Jigsaw pictures
• Use your own pictures as Jigsaws
• Use your own music as the sound track

©2007 Valcon Games LLC, developed by Mere Mortals Ltd., published by Valcon Games LLC. All rights reserved. Ultimate Board Game Collection is published by Valcon Games and is not to be confused with the products of any other manufacturer or publisher. The Valcon logo is a trademark of Valcon Games LLC.
